description:
Microsoft's Windows 8.1 brings hundreds of updates, fixes, and tweaks for both home and business users, as well as for form factors from small tablets to large-screen workstations.

There are plenty of new capabilities like built-in support for 3D printing, Miracast display sharing, and a new Web radio feature in the included Xbox Music app. And yes, the desktop does now have a Start button! Another vehement request of the long-time Windows users was that you should be able to bypass the modern-style Start screen entirely, and with Windows 8.1 this becomes possible.

In this course you will learn:

  • About the power of personal computers and their usefulness to essentially everyone.
  • How to organize your files.
  • How to customize your virtual workspace.
  • How to expand your productivity, and more!
SONIC's Windows 8.1 training videos will explain all the new functions and capabilities and provides practical tips in the form of easy-to-follow instructions.
title: Using Windows 8.1
instructors: SONIC - High Quality Training for Over 20 Years
